question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this taskYou have seen an advertisement in an Australian magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six- year-old child.Write a letter to the parents. In your letter– Explain why you would like the job– give details of why you would be a suitable person to employ– say how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: My name is Jane Robert. I live in the Southern part of Australia. I am writing a letter in regards to your advert published in the magazine to stay with your family for six months and take care of your child.

In this view, I would be interested to accept the job. Currently, I am doing a part-time job. Therefore, I have free time till mid of the day. Moreover, your location is just 5 miles away from my home and there is frequent city bus transportation available between our places. Thus, I believe that the job will be most suitable for me.

Since I am a mother of 10 years old daughter. Hence, I know very well how to handle small children and make them more comfortable in absence of their parents. Furthermore, I have a diploma in child care speciality which supports me to apply my skills to the development of children.

I will be spending my time mainly with your kid. I can take her to different activities. I may go with her to the swimming class which is held by the community centre every day. I will be available during weekends also to go  cycling and play in the gardens.
I hope you will consider me for this job.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
